text: A 90-day war, the West German view, provides the pretext for huge German armed forces (within Nato of course) and for those to have bases all over Western Europe. Holland and Belgium. After much bargaining the British Government has agreed to give similar "facilities" to German troops in Britain.
handwritten_text: A 90-day war, the West German view, provides the pretext for huge German armed forces (within Nato of course) and for those to have bases all over Western Europe. Holland and Belgium. After much bargaining the British Government has agreed to give similar "facilities" to German troops in Britain.
